description:
Android 17 has been busy. Not only has he started a family, but he’s been training as well. Will Goku see him as a worthwhile member of the team? And is he even interested in joining?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fists Cross for the First Time! Android #17 vs Son Goku!!
Hajimete Majiwaru Kobushi! Jinzouningen 17 Gou vs Son Gokuu!!
Zum ertsen Mal kreuzen sich die Fäuste! – Goku gegen den Cyborg C17!
初めて交わる拳! 人造人間17号VS孫悟空!!
